attributes.action: More routine checks on the NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details:
Recent research shows how the NHS staff of Queens Hospital, Romford East London, are not considering their patients well-being and conditions and therefore the patients are suffering. This has led to the hospital getting bad GMC reports, and a number of deaths.

http://www.thisislondon.co.uk/standard/article-24010192-my-wife-died-in-childbirth-after-midwives-ignored-cries-for-help.do

This attachement shows evidence that the NHS are not using their full medical knowlegde and full attention to help and support their patients needs and conditions.

As locals to the area, we would like to have a system of which specialists examine hosptials, and its staff, such as Queens, in order to ensure that all hospitals are under control and that the patients well-being to their first priority.
